title: Who are the good guys in The Wire? - Quora
tags: Narcotics Trafficking, Distribution, and the Controlled Substance Trade

response.answer_text: That's actually at the heart of the show: just like in real life, there are none. Some are better than others, but at the end of the day everyone can make the choices that are available to them at any moment. A ‘good’ man without options can be seen as a villian, while a ‘bad’ man with resources can frame himself as a hero. Plus, people change over time. So, you tell me. Who's the good guy?
